headline: JPMorgan Chief Addresses the E.S.G. Backlash
snippet: Mr. Dimon has called the Texas laws bad for business, highlighting the work the bank does to fund schools, hospitals and other businesses.

headline: Is Shoplifting Really Surging?
snippet: Claims that the U.S. is in the middle of a retail theft wave are exaggerated.
abstract: Claims that the U.S. is in the middle of a retail theft wave are exaggerated.

headline: Bidenomics and the Guys in the Bar
snippet: Yes, workers are better off than they were a few years ago.

headline: The T Predictor: What We’ll Be Obsessing Over in 2024
snippet: We asked 46 artists, filmmakers, chefs and other creative people to forecast next year’s cultural trends. (Spoiler: We’re all going to be wearing a lot of brown.)
abstract: We asked 46 artists, filmmakers, chefs and other creative people to forecast next year’s cultural trends. (Spoiler: We’re all going to be wearing a lot of brown.)
byline: By Kate Guadagnino, Jameson Montgomery, Juan A. Ramírez, John Wogan and Carmen Winant

headline: Should Biden Bow Out, as David Axelrod Urged?
snippet: Readers respond to a column by Maureen Dowd. Also: Speaker Mike Johnson’s lament; drive-through downsides; New Orleans drinking water.
abstract: Readers respond to a column by Maureen Dowd. Also: Speaker Mike Johnson’s lament; drive-through downsides; New Orleans drinking water.

headline: A Crossword Anniversary
snippet: A chat with Will Shortz, who has been editing The Times’s puzzle for 30 years.
abstract: A chat with Will Shortz, who has been editing The Times’s puzzle for 30 years.

headline: A Troubling Trump Pardon and a Link to the Kushners
snippet: A commutation for a drug smuggler named Jonathan Braun had broader implications than previously known. It puts new focus on how Donald Trump would use his clemency powers in a second term.
abstract: A commutation for a drug smuggler named Jonathan Braun had broader implications than previously known. It puts new focus on how Donald Trump would use his clemency powers in a second term.
byline: By Michael S. Schmidt, Maggie Haberman, Jonathan Swan and Alan Feuer

headline: This Quiet Blockbuster at the Supreme Court Could Affect All Americans
snippet: This term largely revolves around a single question: Will our government retain the capacity to address the most pressing issues of our time?
abstract: This term largely revolves around a single question: Will our government retain the capacity to address the most pressing issues of our time?

headline: Eat the Rich? How About Dine With Them Instead.
snippet: In “Flight of the WASP,” the inveterate dirt-digger Michael Gross gives America’s elite families the white-glove treatment.
abstract: In “Flight of the WASP,” the inveterate dirt-digger Michael Gross gives America’s elite families the white-glove treatment.
